overview:
Chris Dyball is the founder and CEO of Groupiter, out of this world collaboration for project teams, communities and causes.

Chris started his career in film and media in 1987 chasing waves from helicopters for Surfing Magazine, and escaped convicts for the Washington Post. For work and for NGOs he’s traveled the low border towns of Kyrgyzstan with a Mig-29 fighter pilot and a UN peacekeeper, hunted kangaroos in Australia (none were injured), and been chased by wild dogs through the jungles of Samoa (karma for the kangaroos).

His greatest passion is for connecting key influencers within the nexus of art, technology and culture to craft a better world.

Specialties Team Building, Startups, Philanthropy, Everything Creative
